response.summary:
Since 2014, I have developed expertise in Lean Six-Sigma methodology, continuous improvement and problem solving. I hold the Black Belt Lean Six-Sigma certification. The knowledge acquired during this certification process allows me to master the "complete toolbox" in order to design robust and stable processes as well as effective and efficient controls. 

My main professional objective is to promote operational excellence and a culture of continuous improvement guided by collaboration in order to support companies towards the fourth industrial revolution: Industry 4.0.
response.skills: Gestión de proyectos, Metodos de produccion, ISO 9001, OHSAS 18001 e ISO 14001, Optimización, Eco-diseño de productos y procesos, Gestion de riesgos industriales y ambientales, Lean manufacturing, Lean Construction, Microsoft Office, MS-Project, Visual Basic, Solid Edge, AutoCAD, C++, sigma pro, SAS, Microsoft Excel, Inglés, Investigación y desarrollo, Servicio de atención al cliente

profile_positions.title: Manufacturing Leaders competence development and Manufacturing Managers Development Program Manager
Process Owner Delegate and Process Quality Manager

profile_positions.description:
Develop and implement new process methods & tools around Production System Efficiency: Line Balancing, Time optimization, Andon & Disruption management. 

Lead Shop Floor transformation initiatives & Digital initiatives as part of DDMS journey (EPIQA, MES, PORT Dashboard VA/NVA, Tandem/ACPnG…). 

Production efficiency analysis support through data analysis and working place standard work optimization (VA/NVA, waste eradication) 

Identify and share best practices /benchmark through Plant and Final Assembly lines. 

Lead business continuity / continuous improvement projects as part of the ME Process-Methods-Tools Roadmap. Provide ME expertise to the Plants & FALs to support (BOS).
profile_positions.title: Mfg. Eng. Business Methods Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Consultant on continuous improvement projects related to production, quality and supply chain. 

Project Manager of research projects related to the use of feedback principles for continuous improvement.
profile_positions.title: Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Implementation of the Lean Six-Sigma methodology to optimize the processes of Constructora Bolívar's construction projects. 

Participation in interdisciplinary projects with other departments of the company as part of studies and projects aimed at improving productivity. Achievements : 

VSM of the construction process. 

Implementation of a management system within the construction department (35 construction sites). 

Implementation of indicators to facilitate the decision-making process of the "construction" department (35 construction sites). 

Implementation of a knowledge management system throughout the project life cycle. 

Trainer of the Lean "toolbox" applied to construction process (210 people).

company.name: Airbus
company.description:
Airbus pioneers sustainable aerospace for a safe and united world. The Company constantly innovates to provide the most efficient and technologically-advanced solutions in aerospace, defence, and connected services. In commercial aircraft, Airbus offers the most modern and fuel-efficient airliners. Airbus is also a European leader in defence and security and one of the world's leading space businesses. In helicopters, Airbus provides the most efficient civil and military rotorcraft solutions worldwide.  

Airbus approaches sustainability by respecting the planet, valuing people and enabling prosperity. These guiding principles are embedded in our operations and activities.

In 2022, the Company generated revenues of €58.8 billion and employed a workforce of around 134,000.
